content:
Does each CodeSystem.filter need a unique code? Or only unique (code, op) tuples? Or can (code, op) tuples repeat? I don't see any constraint about this.

(I ask because I want to document filters for SNOMED's "concept" definitions, and the in op and the is-a op have fairly different definitions -- documented in different tables at http://build.fhir.org/snomedct.html#4.3.1.0.8.1 and in the snomed wiki. I'd also like to include a computable mapping showing how to express each "concept filter op" in terms of concept properties. And it's cleaner to do this in distinct filter elements, I think.)
I didn't make a constraint because I couldn't figure out how to express it; whatever is stated has to be meaningful and useable
We don't impose limits on repeating the filter for different ops
